data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Prague who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Prague, Czechia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 8,604 believers in Prague, Czechia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Prague, Czechia to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Prague.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Turk people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, please defend the 8,604 believers in Prague against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Prague.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Prague that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.
